abstract: There are two new managing directors in Credit Suisse‘s investment banking group. The firm said in an internal memo that Tom Delbrook, previously the vice president of finance at the shipping giant UPS, would join the firm’s general industrial and services group, covering the transportation, shipping and logistics industries out of New York.
lead_paragraph: There are two new managing directors in Credit Suisse‘s investment banking group. The firm said in an internal memo that Tom Delbrook, previously the vice president of finance at the shipping giant UPS, would join the firm’s general industrial and services group, covering the transportation, shipping and logistics industries out of New York.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Adds to Investment Banking Team
